name: Space Fight
description:
This game was made:
  • with the free version of construct 3
  • in 3 weeks
Hope you enjoy it! Controls:
  • Move Up:  Arrow Up
  • Move Down:  Arrow Down
  • Shoot:  Spacebar / Left Click
  • Pause:  Escape
Instructions: You have to shoot the enemies and not get hit by them, but remember, if they touch you you're dead! A game by: Fabianz (https://fabianz.itch.io/)
